mapper.select: select cui.user_id, cui.nick_name, cui.user_head, cui.user_name, cui.sex, cc.college_name as college, cui.degree, cuc.start_time, cuc.end_time, cui.id_card_url, cui.diploma_url, cui.interest, cui.status, cui.created_time, cui.updated_time, cui.is_deleted from cotenant_user_info cui left join cotenant_user_college cuc on cui.user_id = cuc.cotenant_user_id and cuc.is_default = 1 left join cotenant_college cc on cc.id = cuc.cotenant_college_id where user_id = #{user_id}

select cuc.id,cotenant_college_id as college_id,college_name,coordinate,cc.province,cc.city,start_time,end_time,is_default from cotenant_user_college cuc left join cotenant_college cc on cc.id = cuc.cotenant_college_id where cotenant_user_id = #{user_id} order by is_default desc

select cui.user_id, cui.nick_name, cui.user_head, cui.user_name, cui.sex, cc.college_name as college, cui.degree, cuc.start_time, cuc.end_time, cui.id_card_url, cui.diploma_url, cui.interest, cui.status, cui.created_time, cui.updated_time, cui.is_deleted from cotenant_user_info cui left join cotenant_user_college cuc on cui.user_id = cuc.cotenant_user_id and cuc.is_default = 1 left join cotenant_college cc on cc.id = cuc.cotenant_college_id order by cui.created_time desc
